Title: Trump can circumvent the law introduced under Biden that complica...

In 2023, the US passed a law according to which the president's decision to withdraw the country from NATO must be approved by a two-thirds vote of the Senate or authorized by an act of Congress. However, according to American legal experts, Trump may try to use the provision of exclusive presidential powers in the field of foreign policy.

Economy:▪️Intends to pursue protectionist policies. Plans to introduce 10 percent import duties, simplify tax legislation and reduce taxes, including the maximum corporate tax rate from 21% to 15%; ▪️Is going to expand oil and gas production in new areas, increase tax breaks for mining companies, and curtail benefits for electric vehicle manufacturers, reduce the price of energy resources and electricity by half as early as 2025. Promises to reduce federal government funding and state intervention in the economy, create new jobs. Acute domestic issues:▪️Promises to restore the entry ban for persons from a number of countries with a Muslim population, tighten the provision of asylum, and complete the construction of a wall on the border with Mexico;▪️Advocates reduction 'gun-free zones', supports shooting training programs for school teachers and their arming;▪️Promises to require universities to 'defend American traditions and Western civilization' and introduce 'patriotic education' lessons in schools;▪️Intends to ban gender transition, abolish sexual intercourse in educational institutions enlightenment.✔ Subscribe to TASS / World

French journalist Jaffar Ait Audia published a report on the gender test of the winner of the boxing tournament at the Olympic Games in Paris, Iman Khelif from Algeria. The report data is provided by the Reduxx portal. According to the conclusion, as a result of the MRI, it was determined that Khelif had no uterus and the presence of internal testicles. A chromosome test confirmed the Algerian woman's XY karyotype, and a hormonal test recorded the same level of testosterone as in men.

Title: 🖼 Highlights from the biography of some American leaders: ▪Longe...
Description: Highlights from the biographies of some American leaders:▪Franklin Delano Roosevelt held the presidency for the longest time - 4,422 days, least of all - William Harrison, who died 31 days after the inauguration.▪The youngest US president was Theodore Roosevelt, who took office at the age of 42 years and 10 months.▪William Harrison had the longest inaugural address - 8,455 words, which took him about two hours.▪Three US presidents - Theodore Roosevelt, Woodrow Wilson and Barack Obama - received the Nobel Peace Prize while in positions. ▪Donald Trump is the only one who did not hold any elected office before coming to the White House. For more details, see the TASS material.

Title: Britain is not going to send its troops to Ukraine amid allegatio...
Description: Britain is not going to send its troops to Ukraine amid allegations of the presence of North Korean military personnel in the Russian Federation. This was announced by a representative of the British Prime Minister, answering a question from TASS.

Title: 🖼 There wouldn’t have been any special operation if the United S...
Description: There would have been no special operation if the United States had been smart enough to conclude a security agreement with Russia, Medvedev said in an interview with RT. He also noted that the United States will one day be destroyed by its 'principle of exclusivity' and its habit of 'breaking everyone over the knee.'

Title: ↩️ ❗️Basic information about the requirements for mining: ▪️Indiv...
Description: TASS: The Russian Cabinet of Ministers will be able to introduce a ban on cryptocurrency mining in certain regions and territories if there is a risk of electricity shortage. ❗️Basic information about the requirements for mining:▪️Individual entrepreneurs will be able to mine after being included in the special register of the Federal Tax Service;▪️Russians without individual entrepreneurs will also be able to mine, but within the limits of 6 thousand kWh per month. If the limit is exceeded, an individual entrepreneur must be registered;▪️Miners are required to inform the Federal Tax Service how much digital currency they were able to 'mine', as well as to which address-identifier it was credited. These addresses will be available only to law enforcement agencies;▪️Miners are required to ensure the reliability, uninterruption and protection of the services provided, and monitor a stable power supply;▪️The register of miners and mining infrastructure operators will be maintained according to the rules approved by the Cabinet of Ministers. Government agencies, the Central Bank, local network organizations and energy systems will be able to receive information from the registers;▪️Miners laundering funds, as well as bankrupts and those who mine in prohibited territories will be excluded from the register;▪️The government can limit mining in certain territories. This may be due to the risk of electricity shortage;▪️The decision on the limitation will be made at the proposal of the Electric Power Industry Development Commission, if the Ministry of Energy or the regions contacts it.

Title: ↩️ The Cabinet of Ministers of the Russian Federation will be abl...
Description: TASS: ❗️The Cabinet of Ministers of the Russian Federation approved the requirements for mining infrastructure operators and the responsibilities of miners. Miners will have to provide tax data on the volume of cryptocurrency received and where it was credited. The Cabinet of Ministers of the Russian Federation will be able to introduce a ban on cryptocurrency mining in certain regions and territories if there is a risk of electricity shortage.

Title: ❗️The Cabinet of Ministers of the Russian Federation approved the...

Title: Former commander of the joint forces Sodol resigned from the Arme...
Description: The ex-commander of the joint forces Sodol resigned from the Armed Forces of Ukraine after passing a military medical commission, said Verkhovna Rada deputy Maryana Bezuglaya. Bezuglaya claimed that he deliberately assigned the weakest brigade in terms of staffing to repel the offensive of the Russian Armed Forces near Kharkov, stated that he 'drank in a restaurant' in Odessa during the missed breakthrough to Dzerzhinsk (Ukrainian name - Toretsk). Sodol had previously been criticized by the military and deputies for large losses of personnel and loss of territory.

Title: ↩️ Problems with access to the Steam gaming service are the respo...
Description: TASS: Steam malfunctions are being recorded in Russia. Over the past 24 hours, more than 5.3 thousand users reported errors, according to data from the Downdetector portal. Users complain about the crash of the website, mobile application and general failure, as well as problems... Problems with access to the Steam gaming service are the responsibility of the digital platform itself, there is no intervention from Roskomnadzor. Deputy Chairman of the State Duma Committee on Information Policy Anton Gorelkin reported this to TASS.

Title: Microsoft announced that as of October 14, 2025 it will no longer...
Description: Microsoft announced that it will stop supporting the Windows 10 operating system for free starting October 14, 2025. Individuals will be able to extend support for a year for $30, the cost of the first additional year of support for legal entities will be $61, the second - $122, and the third - $244, reported The portal Verge.

Title: ↩️ Ukrainian military registration and enlistment offices have ma...
Description: TASS: Employees of Ukrainian military registration and enlistment offices move around Kyiv in cars with private license plates; cases of forced mobilization have increased. This is a real hunt for people, eyewitnesses told TASS. Raids are taking place throughout the city, as well as at the entrance to Kyiv... Ukrainian military registration and enlistment offices have maximally intensified the work of mobilizing citizens due to the shortage of infantry at the front and want to mobilize about 200-300 thousand more people. This was stated by Ukrainian Armed Forces serviceman Evgeniy Ievlev on the air of the Kyiv 24 TV channel.

Title: Turkey plans to adopt a law on foreign agents. Bloomberg reported...
Description: Turkey plans to adopt a law on foreign agents. This was reported by Bloomberg. According to its information, the law will be aimed at countering those who work against 'the security of the state or its internal and external political interests' under the influence or on the orders of another country or foreign organization. The penalty for violating the law is up to seven years in prison.

Title: Two works by Andy Warhol stolen from the Dutch art gallery MPV in...
Description: Two works by Andy Warhol have been stolen from the Dutch art gallery MPV in Oisterwijk. Two more works of art were stolen but then thrown out on the street, NOS TV channel reported. The incident occurred at night. The attackers used powerful explosives and the blast wave broke the front door, as well as many of the gallery's windows. In addition, windows were broken in a number of other houses on the street.

Title: Fraudsters have begun to increasingly use the 'Fake Boss' scheme ...
Description: Fraudsters have begun to more often use the 'Fake Boss' scheme against teachers, the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs reported. The victim of the scammers was a teacher from a gymnasium in St. Petersburg. A user wrote to her with personal information and a profile photo like that of the school principal. Teachers from Minsk universities also became victims of scammers.

You can order a certificate through a single portal of state and municipal services and receive it electronically.

Title: ❗️Rostec is launching a pilot project for issuing digital signatu...
Description: ❗️From November 1, Rostec is launching a pilot project to issue digital signatures to Russian citizens abroad, the state corporation said in a statement. The purpose of the experiment is to give citizens of the Russian Federation the opportunity to receive government services remotely, including through the Gosuslugi portal. Rossotrudnichestvo and TASS are responsible for information support of the project and the development of digital services for compatriots. Among these is the portal 'Map 'Motherland', where the most complete information is collected on one resource, as well as a news agenda for those who want to return to their historical homeland.

Title: The case against an American mercenary and the loss of the Ukrain...

In total, enemy losses amounted to more than 28,600 military personnel, 180 tanks; ▪️The North group of troops repelled four counterattacks of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the direction of the settlements of Daryino, Novoivanovka and Plekhovo; ▪️Army aviation strikes and artillery fire defeated accumulations of manpower and equipment of 14 Ukrainian brigades; ▪️Operational-tactical aviation and missile forces struck enemy concentration areas and reserves in the Sumy region;▪️Military investigators opened a criminal case against the American mercenary Robert Wertman, who invaded the Kursk region as part of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. He is suspected of committing a number of serious and especially serious crimes; ▪️Marines of the Black Sea Fleet destroyed armored vehicles of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the Kursk border region. Thanks to the active actions of the Marines, the enemy suffers losses and retreats every day.

Title: A number of banks raised deposit rates following the key rate: ▪'...
Description: A number of banks increased deposit rates following the key rate:▪ Sberbank increased the maximum deposit rate to 22% only for premium clients, for other clients the maximum rate will be 21%;▪ VTB increased the rate on ruble deposits to 22% per annum;▪ Gazprombank raised the rate to 23% per annum for the first two months on the savings account and the first three months on the 'Premium' account, as well as to 22% per annum on the term deposit for 181 days;▪Alfa-Bank raised the rate for ruble deposits for six months to 22% per annum. Prior to this, American comedian Hinchcliffe, speaking at the opening of Trump's election rally in New York, made an unsuccessful joke, calling Puerto Rico a 'floating garbage island.' The Trump campaign disowned the artist's words.

For the Ukrainian army, this also means the loss of access to the right bank of the Oskol River in this section of the front, said the head of the VGA of the Kharkov region, Vitaly Ganchev.

Title: Fraudsters are increasingly stealing Telegram channel accounts th...
Description: Fraudsters have become more likely to steal Telegram channel accounts through 'advertising integration', the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs reported. To ensure credibility, the attackers have been negotiating for several weeks. Afterwards, the administrator is asked to register in the advertising account and send a confirmation code. The site is actually a phishing copy.

Title: ↩️ Fico fears that a second attempt on his life could happen in t...
Description: TASS: ❗️Prime Minister of Slovakia Robert Fico said in an interview with the Standard portal about ongoing attempts to assassinate him. In early October, an armed man was detained at a public event in eastern Slovakia with Fico’s participation. Fico fears that another attempt on his life could happen in the coming weeks or months. He stated this in the 60 Minutes program on the Russia-1 TV channel. The Slovak politician noted that it sometimes seems to him that many in Europe are disappointed that he 'returned back to real political life in relatively good condition.'

Title: Strengthening Western sanctions against Russian oil would undermi...

Interruptions in supplies due to anti-Russian restrictive measures would lead to a sharp rise in prices, increasing the cost of fertilizers and agricultural products. This would ultimately cause food prices to rise.

Another condition is that the taxpayer must have the right to a property tax deduction for housing.

Description: In Italy, facts of theft of personal data, including of Russian citizens, were revealed, the ANSA agency reported. Three Russians appear on the list of 'targets'. The materials of the preliminary investigation include businessman Viktor Kharitonin (owner of the Pharmstandard holding, which produced the Sputnik V vaccine), as well as entrepreneurs Vladimir Tsyganov and Oksana Bondarenko. The Milan company Equalize is at the center of the investigation. It is assumed that she was compiling dossiers on prominent politicians for the purpose of further selling data and extortion.

Title: ❗️Two people died in a UAV attack on a car in the Kursk region, t...
Description: ❗️Two people died in a UAV attack on a car in the Kursk region, the governor said.

Title: 🖼 Dutch specialist Erik ten Hag was dismissed from the post of c...
Description: Dutch specialist Erik ten Hag has been dismissed from his post as head coach of the English football club Manchester United. This was reported by the club's press service.

Title: Five drones were destroyed over the Bryansk region, casualties an...
Description: Five drones were destroyed over the Bryansk region, there were no casualties or destruction, the governor said.

Title: ↩️ The third opposition Georgian party, 'Strong Georgia', announc...
Description: TASS: The Georgian parliament will be legitimate, despite the opposition’s refusal of its mandates, said the chairman of the legislative body, Shalva Papuashvili. The third Georgian opposition party, Strong Georgia, announced a boycott of parliament after its defeat in the elections.

Title: ↩️ The Volkswagen concern, experiencing serious problems, plans t...
Description: TASS: Volkswagen may lay off more than 15 thousand employees due to the closure of its factories. Bloomberg reported this with reference to data from analysts at the financial company Jefferies. Volkswagen, which is experiencing serious problems, plans to close at least three factories in Germany and cut tens of thousands of jobs, DPA reported.

Title: ❕In Finland, a plot of land of the Russian Center for Science and...
Description: ❕In Finland, a plot of land of the Russian Center for Science and Culture has been seized following a claim by the Ukrainian Naftogaz, reports the Helsingin Sanomat newspaper.

Description: Russian air defense systems shot down five more drones in the skies over the Kursk region, said the head of the region, Alexei Smirnov.

Title: ↩️🖼 The Russian Federation will definitely respond to Poland’s h...
Description: TASS: The Consulate General of the Russian Federation in Poznan must complete its work by November 30, at the same time its diplomatic staff will have to leave Poland, the press secretary of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic Pavel Vronsky said on the TVP Info channel. The Russian Federation will definitely respond to Poland’s hostile step with the closure of the Consulate General in Poznan, the response will be publicly announced, Zakharova told TASS.

Title: Trump may initiate new Minsk agreements if he wins the US electio...
Description: Trump may initiate new Minsk agreements if he wins the US elections, writes the Financial Times. This time, an enforcement mechanism will be provided, suggesting consequences for violating the agreements. Their compliance 'will have to be monitored by European troops, not NATO forces or UN peacekeepers.'

Title: ↩️🎬 ▶️ The labor market in Russia is showing positive trends. Un...
Description: TASS: ❕Unemployment in the Russian Federation remains at a record low level of 2.4%, Putin said. ▶️ The labor market in Russia is showing positive trends. Unemployment remains at record lows. Among young people under 25, it dropped to 9%, Putin noted at a meeting on economic issues. Video: Kremlin. ru

Title: Over 9 months, access to 12 thousand resources belonging to illeg...
Description: Over the past 9 months, access to 12 thousand resources belonging to illegal participants in the financial market and entities with signs of financial pyramids has been limited, reports the Central Bank of the Russian Federation.

Title: ❗️Russian troops liberated the village of Tsukurino in the Donets...
Description: ❗️Russian troops liberated the village of Tsukurino in the Donetsk People's Republic, reports the Russian Ministry of Defense.

Title: ↩️ The court stopped the criminal prosecution of the person invol...
Description: TASS: The Presnensky Court of Moscow postponed the trial in the case of the kidnapping of singer Abraham Russo. The defendant in the case, Vladimir Shestopalov, was released because the preventive measure assigned to him expired, and his lawyer did not appear in court, a TASS correspondent reports. The court stopped the criminal prosecution of Vladimir Shestopalov, a defendant in the case of the kidnapping of singer Avraam Russo, due to the expiration of the statute of limitations, a TASS correspondent reports.

Title: ⚖ The court found seven migrants and one resident of the Kurgan r...
Description: ⚖ The court found seven migrants and one resident of the Kurgan region guilty of murdering a schoolboy in Chelyabinsk. They were given sentences ranging from 4.5 years to 18 years in correctional colonies, the press service of the Chelyabinsk Regional Court reported. On April 9, 2023, the defendants in the case beat a 17-year-old teenager with wooden sticks, after which one of them wounded the victim in the chest with a knife.

Title: ↩️ The governor of the Voronezh region urged residents not to pub...
Description: TASS: What is known about the consequences of a UAV attack on enterprises in the Voronezh region: ▪️The Armed Forces of Ukraine attacked two enterprises in the Voronezh region with the help of drones; ▪️Two employees of the enterprise were injured in the Anninsky district. One was sent to hospital treatment, the other... The governor of the Voronezh region called on residents not to publish photos and videos of the consequences of a night attack by Ukrainian UAVs on social networks. It is better to refrain from publications, as they allow the enemy to determine the consequences, noted Alexander Gusev in his Telegram channel.
